Posts.Content: Feb 7, 2007 10:34AM tamr48 wrote: First thanks everyone for the support! This is a great sight. For me...it came in the mail about a week or so later.
Posts.Title: Second Mammogram tamr48 tamr48

Posts.Content: tamr48 wrote: This is my first time here...I had a mammogram a few weeks ago and am being called back for more films of my right breast. I'm really scared. My mother is a 13 year breast cancer survior but my grandmother passed away from it. My doctor says not to worry but I cant not worry. Has anyone been through this before? The waiting is the hardest part. I don't go back until Feb 19th TY Dx 6/19/2009, IDC, <1cm, Stage I, Grade 1, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Second Mammogram tamr48 tamr48

Posts.Content: Feb 12, 2007 05:41AM tamr48 wrote: Azcamm...Glad to here everything was ok. I guess a little bit of bruising is better then a biopsy. I'm hoping for the same. I had a bad weekend. Crying and worrying alot. My boyfriend is very supportive and said we really have nothing to worry about yet because we don't know anything yet. And when we find something out we'll deal with it then. So I'm trying hard to take his advice. Because I know deep down he is right. But I still can't help thinking that there is this thing growing inside of me. One more week to go. I hope this week goes fast. To all of you out there thanks for listening...you are the best!
Posts.Title: Second Mammogram tamr48 tamr48

Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2007 08:48AM tamr48 wrote: I talked to my doctor yesterday and she told me to try not to worry. But she knows that it is hard. I told her that I want to know the results right away and she said if they don't tell me ask to talk to the radiolgist or call her office. I can't go through the waiting again. But Monday now is only two days away. Will be praying hard this weekend. My head has just been in the clouds. Or has my boyfriend said I was rattled in the head last night..LOL. I'll be glad when this over!
Posts.Title: Second Mammogram tamr48 tamr48
